scripts.build-content-scripts: tsc && browserify -s out/lib/*.js out/content_scripts/*.js -p esmify -o content_scripts/index.min.js
scripts.build-popup: tsc && browserify -s out/lib/*.js out/popup/*.js -p esmify -o popup/popup.min.js
scripts.build-background: tsc && browserify -s out/lib/*.js out/background/*.js -p esmify -o background/background.min.js
